li.label: Outsider
li.description: I had no choice but to join them... i'd have died alone, but i'm scared what they might do to me.

li.label: Third wheel
li.description: I don't really know these people, should i stay?

li.label: Familiar companion
li.description: Most jokes are on me and i get to do all the crappy work, but i seem to start being accepted!

li.label: Part of the gang
li.description: My companions start to value my skills and insight, i get to sit at the table!

li.label: Trusted mate
li.description: My companions are there when i need them and they can count on me!

li.label: True friend
li.description: We have been through alot together and always have each others backs. We would die for each other!
